mapper.select: select distinct cancion.id as id, titulo, genero.nombre as genero, album.nombre as album from listareproduccion, cancion, genero,album where listareproduccion.idUsuario = #{idUsuario} and idCancion is not null and cancion.idAlbum = album.id and cancion.idGenero = genero.id;

select cancion.id as id, titulo, genero.nombre as genero, album.nombre as album, idAlbum, artista.nombre as artista, idArtista,archivo from cancion,album,genero,artista where cancion.idAlbum = album.id and album.idArtista = artista.id and cancion.idGenero = genero.id and genero.nombre = #{nombre} order by rand() limit 20;
Select distinct cancion.id as id, cancion.titulo as titulo, archivo from cancion, album where cancion.idAlbum = #{id}
SELECT * FROM cancion ORDER BY RAND() limit 10
